name: Mortal Kombat 4
description:
Once upon a time, the thunder god Raiden fought against another god called Shinnok who wanted to conquer the universe. Raiden won and banished Shinnok, but now he is back and continues his previous quest. Raiden calls together other warriors to a tournament which determines the one to challenge Shinnok.

Mortal Kombat 4 is a traditional one-against-one versus fighting game. Both fighters try to emtpy the opponent's health bar with punches or kicks. Every fighter also has some special attacks which are triggered with certain button combinations. If the time limit of a round runs out, the fighter with more health wins.

The mobile version of this game has a few differences in comparison to its console/PC brother. It only has nine fighters (Raiden, Liu Kang, Scorpion, Reiko, Tanya, Fujin, Sub-Zero, Quan Chi and the unlockable Reptile) and less special moves. Because of the technical limitations of the platform, the game uses the engine of its predecessor and omits the new 3D look of the other versions.

shot.caption: Title screen.
It's time to select a kombatant!
Each tower represents a difficulty level, with more (or less) fighters to challenge.
Scrolling vertically by the tower and visualizing the challengers.
Sub-Zero "sculpturing" a frozen Shinnok.
Scorpion connects successfully a punch in Tanya.
What a bad luck: Tanya receiving a kick from herself...
Scorpion's harpoon catches its next victim: Quan-Chi!
With a little help of Tanya's uppercut, Raiden goes to the heights.
Before each fight, put a correct Kombat Code and unlock new ways to ensure maximum enjoyment of the game.
Liu Kang attacks Shinnok with his bicycle kick: what will be the result?
Now, the kombatants used simultaneous kicks, but only one of this will be accurate...
Quan-Chi is the winner!
Sub-Zero uses his long sweep to avoid Reiko's "spikes".
Scorpion is burning his opponent.
Sub-Zero have chosen a bad hour to jump: he will be a surprise when landing...
Liu Kang and Rayden using projectiles simultaneously.
The winner will be announced in some instants, just wait!
Fujin grabs Reiko and prepare the move conclusion.
Reiko finishing his opponent using a powerful front kick.
Continue screen.
Game Over screen.
Title screen (in Super Game Boy).
Reiko was smashed by Tanya's aerial kick.
After you finishing the kombat, finish the kombatant too!
Reiko applies a blow (jab?) in himself.
Quan-Chi was caught by Reiko's sweep.
Make the character run holding A+ B buttons and pressing Control Pad Left or Right.
Reiko smashed by Reptile's Dash Punch: noticed the similarity with a Johnny Cage's known move? :-D
Rayden counter-attacking Tanya with his Torpedo.
Damaging: Quan Chi's Teleport Stomp shakes both ground and enemy!
